mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, ID, MESSAGEID, INQUIRYID, SHOPID, STATUS, ITEMID, ITEMPICTUREURL, VIEWPURCHASEDITEMURL, TRANSACTIONID, ORDERID, CLAIMAMOUNT, BUYER, BUYERREQUESTED, CREATIONDATE, LASTACTION, LASTACTOR, LASTDATE, APISTATUS, APIDATE, APIDESCR, LASTDESCRIPTION from db_ebayinquiry where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, ID, MESSAGEID, INQUIRYID, SHOPID, STATUS, ITEMID, ITEMPICTUREURL, VIEWPURCHASEDITEMURL, TRANSACTIONID, ORDERID, CLAIMAMOUNT, BUYER, BUYERREQUESTED, CREATIONDATE, LASTACTION, LASTACTOR, LASTDATE, APISTATUS, APIDATE, APIDESCR, LASTDESCRIPTION from db_ebayinquiry
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , ID , MESSAGEID , INQUIRYID , SHOPID , STATUS , ITEMID , ITEMPICTUREURL , VIEWPURCHASEDITEMURL , TRANSACTIONID , ORDERID , CLAIMAMOUNT , BUYER , BUYERREQUESTED , CREATIONDATE , LASTACTION , LASTACTOR , LASTDATE , APISTATUS , APIDATE , APIDESCR , LASTDESCRIPTION

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
MESSAGEID = #{messageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
INQUIRYID = #{inquiryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ITEMPICTUREURL = #{itempictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
VIEWPURCHASEDITEMURL = #{viewpurchaseditemurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TRANSACTIONID = #{transactionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CLAIMAMOUNT = #{claimamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
BUYER = #{buyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
BUYERREQUESTED = #{buyerrequested,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATIONDATE = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
LASTACTION = #{lastaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LASTACTOR = #{lastactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LASTDATE = #{lastdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
APISTATUS = #{apistatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
APIDATE = #{apidate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
APIDESCR = #{apidescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LASTDESCRIPTION = #{lastdescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
